title: The Gentleman in room 6
creator_credit: Alexander Hammid, George K. Arthur and Meteor Films
brief_description: Short story film about a derelict and forgotten character hiding in a room womewhere in South America. he is confronted by three of his old associates, each of whom provides further clues to his identity which is revealed in the last few seconds of the film.
